requirement_clusters.anchor: The system shall maintain thermal conditions within ±1°C of the specified temperature range for optimal ZBLAN fiber production.
similar_requirements: The system shall maintain a production rate of at least 500 meters of ZBLAN fiber per day.
The system shall maintain a microgravity environment with less than 10^-6 g during ZBLAN fiber production.
The system shall maintain thermal conditions within specified limits to ensure optimal operation of all components.

requirement_clusters.anchor: The system shall maintain consistent product quality across production runs, with less than 5% variation in key quality metrics between batches.
similar_requirements: The system shall maintain a microgravity environment with less than 10^-6 g during ZBLAN fiber production.

requirement_clusters.anchor: The system shall achieve a manufacturing yield of at least 95% usable fiber.
similar_requirements: The system shall maintain a production rate of at least 500 meters of ZBLAN fiber per day.

requirement_clusters.anchor: The system shall maintain a production rate of at least 500 meters of ZBLAN fiber per day.
similar_requirements: The system shall maintain thermal conditions within ±1°C of the specified temperature range for optimal ZBLAN fiber production.
The system shall achieve a manufacturing yield of at least 95% usable fiber.
The system shall maintain a microgravity environment with less than 10^-6 g during ZBLAN fiber production.

requirement_clusters.anchor: The system shall produce ZBLAN fibers with attenuation rates of 0.05 dB/km or lower at 2.5 μm wavelength.
similar_requirements: The system shall produce ZBLAN fibers with less than 1 crystallization defect per kilometer of fiber manufactured in microgravity
